text: BEGIN SELECT count(*) into v_custint from b2_customer where customer_id = v_custid; SELECT count(*) into v_staffint from b2_staff where staff no = v_staffpaid; if (v_custint = 1 and v_staffint = 1) then v_cordno := B2_CORDSEQ.nextval; INSERT INTO B2_CORDER (CORDERNO, ORDER_DATE, CUSTOMER_ID, STAFFPAID) VALUES (v_cordno,SYSDATE,v_custId,V_StaffPAID); COMMIT; DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE( 'Order Number '||v_cordno| | ' was added for customer '||V_custId); DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE( 'Payment was taken by staff member '||v_staffpaid); ELSE IF V_CUSTINT = 0 THEN DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('We do not recognize customer number '||v_custid); End if; IF V_CUSTINT = 0 THEN DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('We do not recognize staff number '||v_staffpaid); END IF; END IF; END;
